items.Justification: The paper focuses on single-photon source characterization, which is not directly related to FSOC or adaptive optics.
This paper deals with deep photonic neural networks, which is not a primary interest for FSOC or adaptive optics research.
This paper focuses on machine learning for resource allocation in hybrid LiFi and WiFi networks, which is not directly related to FSOC or adaptive optics.
This paper investigates the use of LLMs, EEG, and behavioral data to measure attention and sleep, which is not relevant to FSOC or adaptive optics.

This paper discusses optimal joint fronthaul compression and beamforming design for Networked Integrated Sensing and Communications (ISAC) systems, which is tangentially related to FSOC but not strongly focused on adaptive optics or atmospheric turbulence.
